dcterms:creator: Seungyoung Lim
Myungji Kim
Jooyoul Lee
dcterms:description: The KorQuAD 1.0 dataset is a Korean adaptation of SQuAD 1.0, consisting of 10,645 passages and their paired 66,181 questions, where the answer must be a phrase within the passage.
dcterms:title: KorQuAD 1.0

dcterms:creator: Jiyeon Ham
Yo Joong Choe
Kyubyong Park
Ilji Choi
Hyungjoon Soh
dcterms:description: The KorNLI dataset is a Korean natural language inference dataset composed of 950,354 sentence pairs, where a model classifies the relationship between a premise and a hypothesis into one of three categories: entailment, contradiction, and neutral.
dcterms:title: KorNLI

dcterms:creator: Jiyeon Ham
Yo Joong Choe
Kyubyong Park
Ilji Choi
Hyungjoon Soh
dcterms:description: The KorSTS dataset is a Korean semantic textual similarity dataset translated from the STS-B dataset, comprising 8,628 sentence pairs that assess the gradations of semantic similarity between two sentences.
dcterms:title: KorSTS

dcterms:description: The NSMC dataset is a movie review dataset scraped from Naver Movies, consisting of 200K samples labeled with 0 (negative) or 1 (positive), with 150K for training and 50K for testing.
dcterms:title: NSMC

dcterms:creator: Yinfei Yang
Yuan Zhang
Chris Tar
Jason Baldridge
dcterms:description: The PAWS-X dataset is a challenging paraphrase identification dataset in six languages, including Korean, consisting of 53,338 sentence pairs annotated with either 0 (negative) or 1 (positive).
dcterms:title: PAWS-X
